release.note: Internal Release
Public Release
Places Cancel buttons on the output pad
The “Cancel Generation” button will now be disabled until generation is actually in progress!
The imports used by this addin are no longer relative to its location so you can put the addin file where ever you want (in the appropriate addin locations of course!)
`Cancel Build/Generate buttons v0.2 <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/cancel-buildgenerate-buttons.html>`_
Buttons labels are now option. Label state is configured in the IDE options window
Nicer icons for the buttons (from FamFamFam)
`Cancel Build Buttons addin v0.3 <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/cancel-build-buttons-addin-v0-3.html>`_
Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
Renamed project from CancelBuild to CancelBuildButtons. This makes the documentation generation much easier if all these names match.
.addin file was referencing old DLL name
No longer uses the Krypton Toolkit. This was only used for a single checkbox in the options dialog anyway!
Options dialog was pointing to old ClarionEdge node. Changed this to the Tools node
License now has a rst format link
Added features list to the meta data
Removed imports code from addin definition

Item enable conditions are now setup correctly. This means that the buttons will enable/disable correctly. Well almost... they may not disable until the IDE decides to issue a refresh but at least now they respond properly!
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Options panel is now in ClarionAddins options section!
Removed ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Will now build the option dialog node if the global ClarionAddins addin is not found.
